thread.section_title: Outsource Data Recovery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Outsource Data Recovery | outsourcedatarecovery.com
thread.title: Walter Wnuk
thread.title_full: Outsource Data Recovery reviewed by Walter Wnuk

author: Walter Wnuk
title: Walter Wnuk
text:
I sent in our super slow hard drive for repair. Repair was apparently not an option so we had to pay for data recovery. It is a stiff penalty but sometimes you have to pay to learn a lesson.
I hope I never need the service in the future. However I am happy it is available when needed.
You have to put a lot of trust into this type of company. I wanted the data and these guys recovered it.
